function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Use of n95 masks with exhalation valve may not provide adequate protection from airborne particles","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Varying filtering power of disposable surgical masks depending on the model and size of aerosol particles","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of inappropriate face masks in environments potentially contaminated with sars-cov-2","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Imperfect protection provided by masks","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incorrect adhesion of facial filter leading to improper protection from sars-cov-2","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of improperly adhered surgical disposable masks leading to reduced protection from sars-cov-2","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate protection of eyes from exposure to sars-cov-2 due to lack of safety goggles and visors","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close contact with potentially infected person","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reuse of disposable isolation gowns","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Suspension of essential and public services","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of knowledge about sars-cov-2 transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ppe usage leading to increased transmission risk","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of organizational, environmental, and personal measures","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global greenhouse gas emissions have risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Calls for new ethically-based, collaborative and deliberative principles and practices","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Selective use of
